content: Range of digital audio players produced by Creative Technology The **Creative MuVo** (in some markets, formerly *Creative NOMAD MuVo*) is a range of [digital audio players](/wiki/Digital_audio_player) produced by [Creative Technology Ltd.](/wiki/Creative_Technology). More than a dozen models were produced. - [Creative Technology Limited](/wiki/Creative_Technology_Limited) - [Creative NOMAD](/wiki/Creative_NOMAD) - [Creative ZEN](/wiki/Creative_ZEN)
title: Creative MuVo
